name: Explorer: The Quest for the Jewel
overview: COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1993/10, an insert in Compute Magazine. You look around furtively, hoping to see a passage through the tangled mass of rocks and trees. Suddenly you spy an opening in the bushes. You dash through it and pounce on the yellow stone laying on the ground. There! You've finally managed to recover that jewel. Now it's time to explore another maze and find the next jewel.
